title: OCEANIA USELESS SERVERS
body: i keep on getting disconnected and i know its not my net because theirs two pcs in my house and only mine kept dc'ing while the other one worked perfectly fine. when i log out and log back in i can't even log back in it keeps saying failed to login after 3 attempts or something and im getting sick of it kit's really annoying fix your servers.

replies.body:
Is one PC connected wirelessly and the other not? If the one that's having trouble is connected wirelessly, getting it a wired connection is the first thing to try. Failing that, or if it's already a wired connection try going through the connection section of this article: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection

And if none of that helps there is a tool here that may be able to help you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If all else fails, submit a ticket to Player Support detailing your problem:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new (Having logs from the Hextech Repair Tool will help greatly with this) Please be aware that being respectful to player support, hard as they work, will get you a lot further than anger.
